#### **Vårt team**


I teamet är alla i olika åldrar, med olika bakgrund och intressen, men det gemensamma är att vi har ett stort hjärta för varandra och det vi gör. För oss stärker det vi-känslan och säkrar både en bra leverans gentemot kunden samt glädje och balans i vardagen för oss i teamet. Vi värdesätter humor, lyhördhet med glädje och är övertygade om att ett gott skratt förlänger livet! Några av de roliga saker vi gör tillsammans är bland annat: månadsmöten med aktiviteter, kompetensdygn, hackatons, grillkvällar och AW-häng.

title: Software Engineer - Recent Graduate
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 What you need to know about the role As a Software Engineer in the Onboarding Experience team, you will be working on ensuring the “red carpet” experience for the new merchants who want to onboard to Zettle by PayPal card processing and Point-of-Sale offering. Meet our team You will be part of an amazing group of experienced software engineers who are working both on frontend and backend, led by an Engineering Manager and a Product Manager, collaborating with designers and engineers from many other teams in Zettle and PayPal across the world. Location: Stockholm, Sweden. Full time position, starting April 2025
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Your way to Impact:**
 You will have a lot of autonomy in what you would like to do and where you want to impact. You can focus on improving the onboarding and activation experience of our merchants, ensuring a smooth onboarding flow for new users. Or maybe you will be improving the development experience for your colleagues, making the team more efficient. The team is here to help you navigate priorities and do the right thing in a best way possible.
   

  

**Your day to day:**
 You will be collaborating with your engineering team, product manager and designer to set the requirements, design and implement solutions. Together with your teammates, you will make sure that your code meets the quality standards and deploy it production to make our customers happier.
   

  

**What do you need to bring:**
 Good mood and a lot of energy. We are eager to have you in the team to help us become better and learn together. It is preferred to have interest and/or experience working with backend systems.
   

  

* We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don't hesitate to apply.


 globaluniversitygraduatesoftwareengineering
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. title: Full stack developer Intern (Remote)
description:
Join the Revolution of Online Education at Coursfy!
   

  

 Are you a passionate aspiring Full Stack Developer looking to make a significant impact in the world of online education? Do you thrive in dynamic, innovative environments where your skills can directly shape the future of learning? If so, we have an exciting internship opportunity for you!
   

  

**About Coursfy**
 Coursfy is an innovative e-learning platform designed to provide maximum freedom to both instructors and learners. We emphasize flexibility, creativity, and autonomy, empowering instructors to deliver unique educational experiences and allowing learners to tailor their educational journeys. Our platform is built on advanced technology and is committed to delivering a seamless, intuitive user experience that prioritizes ease of use.
   

  

 Why Join Coursfy?
   

  

* Innovative Environment: Be a part of a cutting-edge platform that is redefining online education.
* Impactful Work: Your contributions will directly enhance the learning experience for millions of users worldwide.
* Ease of Use: Help create and maintain a platform known for its user-friendly interface, making education accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
* Collaborative Culture: Join a team of passionate professionals dedicated to making a difference.
* Career Growth: Gain valuable experience and professional development in a supportive learning environment.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Assist in developing and maintaining robust, scalable web applications using the latest technologies.
* Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to create a seamless user experience.
* Implement responsive design principles to ensure our platform is optimized for all devices.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
* Troubleshoot and debug issues to improve platform performance.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends.


**Requirements**
* Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, etc.).
* Experience with back-end development (Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, etc.).
* Familiarity with databases (SQL, NoSQL) and web servers.
* Knowledge of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Familiarity with AWS


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with AI-powered recommendation systems.
* Knowledge of e-learning platforms and educational technologies.


 Coursfy is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
   

  

 Join us in our mission to empower educators and learners worldwide. Apply today and help us shape the future of online education!
   

  

**For more information or questions please contact us at** 
 M.eddin@coursfy.com or phone number +46733697689

title: Senior Software Engineer - Planboo
description:
Hi! We're excited you're here :)
   

  

 This opening is for our partner, Planboo.
   

  

 We help organizations around the world build teams for a sustainable future. Together we are on a mission to leverage technology to regenerate our planet and advance human potential.
   

  

 Planboo is committed to revolutionizing carbon removal through innovative biochar solutions. Working with climate-conscious businesses, farmers, land stewards, and biochar producers, Planboo provides the tools, technology, and training needed to transform sustainably sourced biomass into biochar, generating carbon removal credits and enhancing soil health. Their mission is to permanently remove CO₂ from the atmosphere, supporting people and food systems to prosper.
   

  

**The Challenge**
 Are you a passionate software engineer eager to solve complex technical challenges while making a positive impact on the planet? As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a critical role in leading the development of Planboo's software products. You'll have the chance to build, optimize, and scale our solutions, working closely with the company founders to drive innovation. Your role will include leading full-stack development efforts, mentoring future team members, and ensuring the software aligns with Planboo's strategic objectives.
   

  

 Your challenge: Build scalable, high-performing software solutions that power the carbon removal revolution.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Full-Stack Development: Lead and execute the development of Planboo's software products across both front-end and back-end systems
* Technical Leadership: Set and implement the technical strategy, design software architecture, and establish best practices for the development team
* Product Development: Collaborate with the product team to continuously improve existing products and develop new features that align with our roadmap
* Team Mentorship: Guide and support team members as the team grows, providing technical mentorship and fostering a collaborative work environment
* Integration with Hardware Products: Work closely with hardware engineers to ensure seamless software-hardware integration, enhancing the performance of Planboo's biochar technology
* User Feedback & Testing: Conduct user testing, gather feedback from field users, and implement improvements based on real-world experiences
* Scalability & Performance: Design systems that are robust, scalable, and capable of handling increased user demand as we grow
* Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with the founders and other departments to align software solutions with Planboo's business goals


**Requirements**
**What We're Looking For**
* 5+ years of full-stack development experience with Javascript/Typescript and Node.js, ideally with knowledge of React/React Native for front-end development
* Expertise in cloud platforms, especially AWS, including services like EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda
* Strong experience in building scalable software architecture with a deep understanding of microservices, serverless, and monolithic designs
* Proven ability to lead software projects from concept to deployment, including experience with version control (Git/GitHub), CI/CD pipelines, and containerization (Docker)
* Familiarity with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Dynamo)
* Excellent problem-solving skills, with experience integrating software with hardware products
* Bonus Points: Experience with carbon removal projects, embedded systems, or working in international, mission-driven teams


**Who You Are**
* You are an ambitious builder who thrives in a fast-paced, startup environment
* You're a team player who enjoys mentoring others and solving challenges collaboratively
* You're passionate about making a positive impact on the planet through your technical skills
* You are adaptable, pragmatic, and committed to delivering reliable, scalable software


**Benefits**
**What We Offer You**
* An opportunity to make a measurable, positive impact on global carbon removal efforts
* The chance to work directly with Planboo's leadership team and contribute to high-level strategic decision-making
* A flexible, mission-driven work environment with room for personal and professional growth
* Travel opportunities to project locations, including spending time in Sri Lanka for several weeks


**Who We Are**
 Join a diverse team of engineers, farmers, scientists, and visionaries tackling global challenges. We believe in Win-Win collaboration, Relentlessness, and Authenticity. Planboo is committed to advancing CO2 removal, addressing global inequality, and fostering a workplace where diversity of thought is celebrated.
   

  

 Planboo is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer, and we encourage applicants of all backgrounds to apply.

title: Fullstack Java Developer
description:
Job Title: Fullstack Developer (Java/React)
 



 Location: Sweden
 



 Job Type: Full-time/Contract
 



 Experience : 6+ yrs
 



  





 About the Role:
 



 We are seeking a skilled Fullstack Developer with experience in both Java and React to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and high-performance web applications. You will work closely with our product and design teams to build robust, user-friendly applications and contribute to the entire development lifecycle, from concept to deployment.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 - Design and Development: Develop and maintain web applications using Java for backend services and React for frontend interfaces.
 



 - End-to-End Development: Participate in all phases of software development, including requirement analysis, design, coding, testing, and deployment.
 



 - API Integration: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs to connect frontend components with backend services.
 



 - Code Quality: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code, and conduct code reviews to ensure high-quality output.
 



 - Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to deliver high-quality software solutions.
 



 - Troubleshooting: Debug and resolve technical issues, optimizing performance and ensuring high availability and scalability.
 



 - Continuous Improvement: Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, and proactively suggest improvements to existing processes and systems.
 



  





 Qualifications:
 



 - Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
 



  





 Experience:
 



  - Minimum of 6+ years of experience in fullstack development.
 



  - Proficient in Java (Spring Boot) for backend development.
 



  - Strong experience with React and modern JavaScript frameworks for frontend development.
 



  





 Technical Skills:
 



  - Expertise in building and consuming RESTful APIs.
 



  - Strong understanding of front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+).
 



  - Familiarity with database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
 



  - Experience with version control systems, such as Git.
 



  - Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.
 



  





 Soft Skills:
 



  - Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
 



  - Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
 



  - Ability to work independently and as part of a team in an agile environment.
 



  





 Preferred Qualifications:
 



 - Experience with microservices architecture and containerization tools like Docker.
 



 - Knowledge of state management libraries like Redux or Context API.
 



 - Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
 



 - Experience with testing frameworks such as JUnit, Mockito, and Jest.
 



  





 What We Offer:
 



 - Competitive salary/rate and benefits package.
 



 - Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
 



 - Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
 



 - Flexible working hours and the possibility of remote work.
 



  





 How to Apply:
 



 If you are passionate about building high-quality software and want to work in a dynamic and innovative environment, we would love to hear from you. Please send your resume and a cover letter to owision.se@owision.com with the subject line "Fullstack Developer (Java/React) Application."

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description:
**Xensam: SAM Disrupters** 




 Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
 



  





 Join our dynamic team as we develop the next generation Software Asset Management platform. We are a forward-thinking company that values innovation, collaboration, and a passion for technology. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality software solutions that meet the evolving needs of our clients.
 



  





**About the role** 




 We are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Developer that will mostly focus on Frontend with expertise in React and Node.js. The ideal candidate will also have some experience with PostgreSQL and a strong desire to write maintainable and efficient code. This role requires a self-sufficient, driven individual who takes pride in their work and is eager to help other team members when needed. A positive attitude and passion for coding are essential.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* **Develop and Implement:** 
 Design and build user interface components using React.js and Node.js, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
* **Collaborate:** 
 Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and database developers, to create seamless and engaging user experiences.
* **Optimize:** 
 Continuously improve application performance and scalability, utilizing best practices and modern technologies.
* **Mentor:** 
 Provide guidance and support to junior developers, fostering a collaborative and learning-focused environment.
* **Maintain Code Quality:** 
 Participate in code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
* **Innovate:** 
 Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements and new features.



  





**Qualifications** 



* 5+ years of professional experience in full-stack/frontend development with React and Node.js. Also experience with modern development tools and environments, such as Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms.
* Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and popular React.js workflows, preferably Mobx.
* Familiarity with PostgreSQL and experience integrating it into applications.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.
* Ability to work effectively in a team environment, with a willingness to share knowledge and support others.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile team.
* **Strong verbal and written communication skills in fluent English and Swedish.**



  





**What we offer** 



* A dynamic role that focuses on "freedom under responsibility"
* 3 days in-office schedule (remote Mondays & Fridays)
* A generous work culture with free access to beverages & snacks, gym, bi-weekly massages at the office, shuffleboard, and other games etc.
* If sales targets are met, an annual destination trip awaits all employees
* Work with a diverse group driven by ambition as well as having fun together with different activities
* Great opportunity to influence your career development as well as the company's
* Work with the latest technology in the fastest-growing SAM software in the market



  





**At Xensam, our core values define our workplace atmosphere** 




**REBELLIOUS** 
 We foster a rebellious spirit, promoting freedom within responsibilities and encouraging initiative.
 



**HUMANE** 
 Our team promotes a caring, inclusive environment where diversity is valued, and individuals are respected and empowered to be themselves.
 



**HARMONIOUS** 
 We prioritize harmony, valuing work-life balance, and creating a pleasant atmosphere.
 



  





 Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and caring workplace. If you're a team player eager to grow professionally,
 **APPLY now!**

title: Java Software Engineer
description:
**At DbVis Software** 
 , we are passionate about building the ultimate tool for developers to manage the ever-growing world of data. Our foundation is built on providing highly engineered tools that enable users to connect, manage, and optimize databases and their data.
 



  





 Since 2003, our mission has been to engineer the best database tools on the planet, and we are proud to have created a product used by companies and developers globally, reflecting our commitment to highly engineered products that we ourselves want to use.
 



  





 DbVisualizer is engineered using Java, and we are currently enhancing and expanding the product by adding server-side features, real-time collaboration, and AI capabilities, among others. The details are still evolving, and perhaps you could be a part of shaping them?
 



  





**About the role** 




 We are looking to expand our core development team with a talented Java developer. You’ll be joining a compact, cohesive team that has established mature structural capital, including efficient tools and methodologies.
 



  





 Our team works with multi-disciplinary roles where each developer gets to own and participate in the full lifecycle of new features. This means analyzing, architecting, designing, coding, testing, shipping and supporting our new features – so we take full responsibility for the quality, as this is how we differentiate.
 



  





 In this role, you will engage directly with our users to understand how they use the product, help solve their challenges, and identify areas for improvement.
 



  





**Key responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain DbVisualizer, a state-of-the-art database tool trusted by engineers all over the world



  





**About you** 




 To succeed in this role, you are a strong Java developer. You have worked with both desktop and web applications, and have experience in building frameworks, application features, APIs and user interfaces.
 



  





 Working with various database engines, performance tuning, parsers and syntax analysis, UX, UI, REST APIs, web applications, cloud and AI sounds exciting to your ears. You are result-oriented, eager to take responsibility and unafraid of technical challenges.
 



  





 You are self-driven, motivated, and thrive on discussing high-level programming concepts with your colleagues. Your ideas and contributions will not only be acknowledged – but celebrated.
 



  





**Relevant technologies** 



* Java
* Desktop and web applications
* Cloud services and architecture
* Relational and NoSQL databases
* Experience with open source projects is a plus
* Experience with JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js is a plus



  





**What we offer** 



* A stimulating environment with great colleagues and exciting technical challenges.
* A great product trusted by engineers all over the world.
* A small company where your contribution really matters.



  





*DbVis Software is partnering with Safemind as the exclusive partner managing this recruitment process.*

title: Senior Backend Developer (Python)
description:
**Senior Backend Developer – Stockholm, Hybrid** 




 Are you passionate about building innovative backend solutions for the energy sector in a consultancy environment? Want to play a key role in developing cutting-edge applications for a diverse client base, where you'll tackle complex data optimisation challenges and create impactful products with a focus on robust backend systems?
 



  





**What's in it for you?** 




 You'll join a dynamic team of software engineers and data scientists, specialising in custom product development for the energy industry. Your role will primarily focus on backend development, allowing you to dive deep into complex systems and data infrastructure.
 



  





 Enjoy a flexible hybrid work model, balancing time between client offices, your company's headquarters in Stockholm, and remote work. This varied approach allows you to immerse yourself in client environments, collaborate closely with your team, and maintain productivity from home when needed. You'll engage in projects of various scales, collaborating with cross-functional teams and interfacing directly with clients to deliver tailored solutions.
 



  





 You'll get a competitive salary offering up to 70,000 SEK per month (depending on your experience). They are committed to professional growth, with plans to offer clear paths to leadership roles as the company expands. With ambitious growth plans, there's potential for advancement to senior technical positions in the future. On top of this you’ll get 30 days vacation, a health and wellness allowance (friskvård) and private pension contribution.
 



  





**What you'd be doing?** 




 You'll typically work in agile teams of 5-6 people, sometimes scaling up for larger projects. You might spearhead new initiatives, assessing client needs and building your team from within the company.
 



  





 Your work will involve developing sophisticated data infrastructure, implementing machine learning components, and creating robust APIs. You'll use a modern tech stack including cloud services, containerisation, and message brokers. Key technologies you'll work with include Python, Django, FastAPI, Kubernetes, Airflow, PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB, Kafka, and RabbitMQ.
 



  





 You'll be responsible for designing and implementing scalable backend systems, optimising performance, and ensuring data integrity and security.
 



  





  





**About you?** 




 You have at least 4 years of experience in backend development, with a strong focus on Python and frameworks such as Django and FastAPI. You're passionate about clean, efficient code and stay current with emerging technologies. Adaptability is key, as you'll work across various domains and tech stacks.
 



  





 You’d have experience with DevOps practices (like Kubernetes, Docker, Git), cloud platforms (like AWS/Azure), and familiarity with data processing and machine learning tools. Leadership experience and strong communication skills would also be good here, as you'll be able to mentor team members and interface with clients whilst contributing to the evolution of backend development practices within the team.
 



  





 Consultant-style experience is beneficial, as client interaction is a significant part of the role and fluency in both Swedish and English is a must for effective client communication.
 



  





**A bit about them?** 




 A growing tech consultancy in Stockholm, specialising in software solutions for the energy sector. They partner with both established industry leaders and innovative startups, focusing on data-driven applications that promote sustainability.
 



  





 The company culture emphasises collaboration, continuous learning, and making a positive impact in the green tech space. They're seeking motivated individuals who can drive technical discussions and align with their mission to create meaningful solutions in the energy sector.
 



  





 With a current team of about 45 and plans for significant growth, this role offers an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of energy tech innovation in a rapidly expanding organization.
 



  





  





*Don't worry if your CV isn't up to date - just send me a message on LinkedIn or an email over to will@zebrapeople.com and we can go from there.* 




  





  





*3 stage Interview Process* 



1. *Initial Chat*
2. *Technical Discussion*
3. *Final with CEO*

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our Qt/QML Developer - Automotive GUI**
**About VIPAS :**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description:**
 We are looking for a driver display GUI developer for the Automotive industry.
   

  

 We are looking for a developer to join the team in ensuring a premium quality driver interface by utilizing the full potential of ECU system and development tools.
   

  

 As a developer, you will play a key role in developing user interfaces for the applications. You will work closely with designers, developers, and product managers to implement high-quality, performance-optimized, and visually appealing UIs using Qt Quick/QML.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and implement high-quality user interfaces for automotive applications using Qt Quick/QML.
* Collaborate closely with designers and product teams to ensure intuitive and user-centric UI/UX design.
* Integrate QML with C++ backends for optimized performance and smooth functionality.
* Maintain and improve existing GUI systems while ensuring code quality and performance.
* Utilize version control systems like Git for collaborative development and continuous integration.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to GUI functionality, ensuring a premium user experience.
* Work with agile development methodologies and contribute to continuous improvement of processes.


**Requirements:**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a QML Developer or in a similar role.
* Proficiency in QML and Qt Quick, with a strong understanding of UI/UX principles.
* Solid experience in C++ programming and integration with QML.
* Familiarity with version control tools like Git.
* Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and problem-solving abilities.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to work independently and within cross-functional teams.
* Experience with agile methodologies is a plus.
* Knowledge of Swedish is meritorious, but English fluency is required (verbal and written).


**Work Setup:** 
 Hybrid work environment: 3 days in-office, the remainder from home.
   

  

**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

**Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at sandhya@vipas.se**
 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How to Apply:**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Senior Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Are you a talented software engineer who regularly uses AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to use AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions that will bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.
   

  

 At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
   

  

* AdvocateHub: Integrate an AI-powered bot using a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) approach with OpenAI's GPT-4. You'll develop a seamless sidebar widget, implement feature flags, and build a robust logging mechanism to capture KPIs. Sharpen your skills in AI integration, UI/UX design, and data-driven development.
* Jive Cloud: Build a game-changing AI feature using generative AI and the Jive REST API. You'll leverage AI interactions within existing user activities, abstract the AI provider for flexibility, and optimize search functionality. Grow your expertise in AI architecture, API design, and performance optimization.
* ACRM: Develop a cutting-edge CRM solution that seamlessly integrates sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. You'll work on building advanced data analytics modules, implementing machine learning algorithms for predictive insights, and creating intuitive data visualization tools. Expand your skill set in data engineering, AI/ML, and UI/UX design while creating a platform that drives customer success.


 In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.
   

  

 Here's what you can expect from our application process:
   

  

* A quick check: Answer a few yes/no questions to confirm you meet the basic requirements.
* Prove your potential: Take a 15-minute cognitive assessment (the Criteria CCAT), scientifically proven to be the best predictor of success in roles that require rapidly gaining and applying new knowledge.
* Showcase your skills: Demonstrate your coding prowess by writing, testing, and refactoring code, developing new features with AI, and collaborating with AI to diagnose and solve problems.
* Connect with leadership: Engage in a 30-minute Google Meet interview with a member of our Engineering leadership team.


 This comprehensive process takes approximately 5 hours, which you can complete at your own pace. We value your time and effort, so we'll provide the results of each assessment within 24 hours of completion and interview decisions within 3 business days.
   

  

 Are you up for the challenge? Trilogy is for the brave, the curious, and the forward-thinking. We're remapping the world of work with AI as our compass. Ready to join the journey?
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
* Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
* Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
* Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
* Crafting AI 2nd Brains --AI-driven summaries of product, domain, or company knowledge--making you and your team smarter and faster.
* Becoming an AI pioneer leading the charge in integrating AI into software engineering, proving it's a force multiplier, not a replacement.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
* Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking.


**Senior Developer Key Responsibilities**
 Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
   

  

**Basic Requirements**
* 4+ years of experience in software development with a focus on writing production code for the server-side of web applications.
* At least 2 years of experience being the primary technical contributor in a team for a software product's development.
* At least 1 year of hands-on experience with cloud-native development (any cloud vendor) or serverless architectures.
* Experience leveraging AI tools like Copilot, Cursor, or ChatGPT in day-to-day software development (e.g. creating prompts for coding tasks).
* Proficiency in SQL AND at least 2 other programming languages (preference for Typescript, Javascript, Python, and C#)
* Must be willing to learn and work in new programming languages with the help of AI


**About Trilogy**
 Hundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-3889-SE-Stockhol-SeniorDevelope

title: Salesforce Developer
description:
*Join our dynamic IT B2B CRM team, where you'll have central role in enhancing and supporting our Salesforce platform. In this role, you’ll enjoy the autonomy to manage projects from start to finish – from gathering and refining requirements to development, testing, and deployment. At the same time, we foster a collaborative and creative environment where your ideas are valued, and teamwork is encouraged. If you thrive in a fast-paced setting that challenges you to think creatively and deliver high-quality solutions, this is the place for you!* 




  





 Are you ready to be at the forefront of digital innovation? Join our dynamic team at Tele2, where Digital Capabilities & Technology (DCT) is the engine behind our products and services. As the essential enabler of our commercial ambitions, DCT brings automation and simplicity to the telecommunications industry, revolutionizing the way we connect and communicate. Within our organization, you’ll find everything from the backbone infrastructure of technology and IT systems, serving both our external & internal customers, to advanced analytics, AI creation, and frontend development. Our team plays a vital role in ensuring reliable and premium services through delivering exceptional experiences to our end customers, both Consumer and Enterprises, all the while supporting our colleagues within Tele2.
 



  





**About the job** 




 As a Salesforce Developer, you will be a part of the IT B2B CRM Team and together, you will be responsible for delivering Continuous Improvements, support, and incident handling to the Salesforce Users at Tele2. Our main Stakeholders are Sales, Service and Marketing which we have a close collaboration with. The role will require you to work independently through the entire process, from detailing requirements to development, testing and deployment. However, we are a team that value and encourage collaboration and the ability to be creative while delivering high quality solutions in line with our guidelines.
 



  






 Areas of responsibility
 



* Develop code in Apex in Salesforce (Sales and Service Cloud)
* Meet with stakeholders to determine business, functional and technical requirements and participate in application design, configuration, testing and deployment.
* Utilize best practices to provide operational support, enhancements, bug fixes as needed on the Salesforce platform.
* Follow Way of Working for updating incidents, requests, changes, problems, etc.
* Proactively engage in continuous improvements and application design.
* Provide technical assistance and end user troubleshooting through bug fixes, enhancements, and “how-to” assistance.



  





**Who are you?** 




  





 To succeed in this role we believe that you have...
 


* Salesforce Certification in Platform Developer I & II (required)
* Hands on experience working with the Salesforce platform and in Salesforce projects
* Software engineering skills with Lightning Platform (LWC, Apex, VisualForce, SOQL, Unit Testing)
* Working knowledge and experience with complex business systems integration as well as object-oriented design patterns and development
* Experience with web services (REST & SOAP, JSON & XML, etc.)
* Excellent organizational, verbal, and written communication skills including Stakeholder Management



  





 To thrive in this role, we believe that you are familiar working in a maintenance/agile team with methodologies such as SCRUM & CI/CD. You have a technical interest and a curiosity to understand business demands and develop your software engineering skills. If you have Java experience that is a big plus. We also believe that you have a desire to work within a fast-paced, collaborative, and team-based support environment. Sounds like you? Keep reading!
 



  





**A few words from the manager** 




*Hi!* 




*I’m Liliane Sandqvist and I’m the manager for the IT B2B CRM team. In our diverse team we have an open atmosphere where everyone’s opinions are equally important. We believe that innovative ideas come from tight collaboration and that instant feedback enables us to grow, both individually and as a team.* 




*Together we set the foundation for an inspiring work environment. We take joint code ownership, lift each other up, and take great responsibility for our work. It is important for us to have fun at work, while efficiency always is in focus. We value the variety in our work, as it makes us learn new cool stuff every day.* 




*Our team strives to have a very structured way of working with clear priorities for our deliveries and close dialogues with our business stakeholders. This helps us to know that we are constantly contributing to what is most important for our customers.* 




  





**Why Tele2** 



* We believe in fostering a creative and flexible work environment. You will be part of a culture where teamwork and inclusion are leading the way forward, a place where you bring your whole self to work as the unique person you are. We are committed to building a company that values diversity in all its forms.
* Every employee is important for the company’s success and you will always have an impact through your work with opportunities for growth and development through internal paths.
* At Tele2, we work hard to our commitment to lead in sustainability, which has made us the number one climate leader in Europe and we keep reaching new goals as we are bound to shift to a circular economy.



  





**Interest and application** 




 Would you like to be a part of the Tele2s value-driven and including culture? Then hit the “apply now” button and let’s find out if we’re a match!
 



 Please note that in compliance with personal data management regulations (GDPR), we are unable to accept CVs via email.
 



 As a step in the recruitment process, Tele2 performs a background check on final candidates.

title: Mobile Developer (iOS, Android, Cross-platform)
description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.
   

  

 We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them. The role is relatively broad and focused on mobile technologies, where we offer the opportunity to work on many interesting projects.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A chance to work on unique projects that explore and push the boundaries of what's possible.
* A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
* A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
* Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


**As a Mobile Developer at Umain, your role will involve:**
* Design, build, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for iOS, Android, Kotlin Multiplatform, Flutter or any other new technologies that excite us.
* Engaging with languages like Kotlin, Dart, Swift to craft performant and scalable code.
* Collaborate and participate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features across both platforms.
* Participating in projects & teams alongside major brands and large organisations, and contributing to emerging tech trends and innovations.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to ensure our apps are cutting-edge.


**Who You Are**
* You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
* You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
* You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
* You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


**If You Are An Android Developer**
* Minimum 3-4 years of experience in Android development.
* Experience in Kotlin and/or Java.
* Experience with Jetpack Compose and familiarity with the latest Android development frameworks.
* Strong understanding of Android development lifecycle and architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM, MVI).
* Interest in new Android technologies, such as Compose Multiplatform, Kotlin Multiplatform.


**If You Are An IOS Developer**
* Minimum 3-4 years of experience in iOS development.
* Experience in Swift and/or Objective-C.
* Experience with SwiftUI and familiarity with the latest iOS frameworks and features.
* Strong understanding of iOS development lifecycle and architecture patterns (e.g., MVC, MVVM).
* Familiarity with Combine and async/await patterns.
* Experience with Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) is a plus.


**Bonus Points If You Have One Of These**
* You have experience with React Native, Flutter, or other cross-platform development frameworks.
* You have worked with integrating backend systems and mobile backend-as-a-service (BaaS) solutions.
* You have practical knowledge of unit testing, test-driven design and/or continuous integration.
* You have experience working with Cloud Providers, such as Firebase or GCP/AWS.
* You have experience with CI/CD tools, automated testing, and mobile release pipelines.
* You have an understanding of mobile app security best practices (e.g., data encryption, secure APIs, authentication/authorisation).


**Why Umain?**
* Career Framework:


 We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.
   

  

* Work-Life Balance:


 At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.
   

  

* Innovations and Learning:


 Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.
   

  

* Skills Over Degrees:


 We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.
   

  

**Are You Ready to Shape, Ship, and Scale with Us?**
 If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.
   

  

 Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: Engineering Manager, Game Backend Framework | Shared Technology
description:
**Craft:**
 Technology & Development
   

  

**Job Description:**
 Are you a natural connector who thrives when developing great people and teams? How about working with a high performing backend software team that provides the foundation for sweet games enabling a wonderful experience for 260 million players?
   

  

 The Game Backend Framework is all about Java and scalability, supporting games like Candy Crush, which means handling millions of requests per second to our game servers. As our games and tech evolve together with new business challenges we also have to ensure our people and teams are set up for success. This is where you come into play!
   

  

**Your role within our Kingdom**
 This team is responsible for the heart of the Game backends, a fine tuned and high performance Java based platform that makes it easy to build and run game backends at scale. Our devotion is to the game teams and to provide a smooth developer experience enabling them to continuously evolve our games. We also deeply care about our players, making sure our games run reliably and continue to provide a world class experience of fun to millions of players every day.
   

  

 As our sparkling new Engineering Manager, you will inspire and empower the talents in your team, enable them to excel in building great software, whilst supporting individual career growth through personal goal setting and continuous feedback. You will support the team with recruitment, mentoring, coaching, facilitation and performance management and more. Inspire, engage and guide the team through challenges that require extensive collaboration, exceptional engineering and most importantly a fun, open and relaxed working environment.
   

  

 You will be accountable for the team commitments to deliveries and ensure the team has good ways of working and prerequisites for top performance. You will facilitate and enable discussions and decisions of both technical and non-technical nature. You will also be coordinating projects and engaging with stakeholders in collaboration with the product manager.
   

  

**Skills To Create Thrills**
* We think your saga started with a passion for problem-solving and tech, leading towards developing exciting software that gives you a sound understanding of the craft and the challenges developers face daily.
* You also have a deep engagement for humans and team dynamics and are committed in supporting people to grow and collaborate in high performing teams.
* You have a few years experience leading teams and understanding of product centric methods and Agile practices.
* You have the ability to build relationships across the organization and manage critical communication and coordinate projects on behalf of the team.
* You have a humble and open approach to leadership, with a strong belief in empowerment, trust and collaboration.


**We care deeply about our culture and believe in:**
* An inclusive and diverse workplace
* Continuous improvement of everything we do
* Collaboration and blame free problem solving
* Asking for help and sharing ideas openly


 You will be a part of a collaborative leadership team and have the opportunity to apply strategic thinking and planning across the product domain. We value collaboration on all levels and you will have the opportunity to contribute and drive initiatives across the domain.
   

  

**About King**
 At King, we're Making the World Playful. Heard of Candy Crush? We're the creators behind it. With game studios in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona and Berlin, and offices in Dublin, San Francisco, New York, and Malta, we have a 20-year history of delivering some of the world's most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry and are on a mission to level-up the little moments for our more than 200 million active monthly users. But we aren't just crushing it with candies, we're also behind Farm Heroes, Bubble Witch, Pet Rescue and loads of other sweet games. As a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, King is part of Activision Blizzard, which was acquired by Microsoft.
   

  

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**
 King strives to be a place where everyone can be their most authentic self. We recognize that diversity, equity and inclusion is a vital and continuous conversation, and that change only happens when we all come together. It’s our mission to build a diverse and inclusive Kingdom for our people, players, and community.
   

  

**Making the World Playful**
 Making the World Playful is our mission – it’s the thread that connects our people, our players, and our passion for our games. Let’s face it, who doesn’t love a bit of fun?
   

  

 Kingsters are seriously playful: creative thinkers who balance art and science to bring moments of magic to millions daily. But our players aren’t the only ones that can level-up. We’re always looking for ways to champion each other and make what’s already great, even better.
   

  

 So, if this feels like a fun way to spend your days, and you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful.
   

  

 Applications need to be in English.
   

  

 Discover King at careers.king.com

title: Snowflake Developer
description:

 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
   

  

 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

 AirFlow

Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.

title: BI Developer - Data Ingestion Specialist
description:
**BI Developer - Data Ingestion Specialist** 




  




* Är du riktigt vass på BI Utveckling & Data Ingestion samt älskar att resa på fritiden?
* Vill du bidra till att skapa den bästa kundresan & reseupplevelsen för våra kunder?
* Vill du arbeta i en familjär, varm och omtänksam företagskultur ihop med dedikerade och riktigt kompetenta medarbetare?



  





 Då är rollen som BI Developer - Data Ingestion Specialist på Apollo som klippt och skuren för dig, läs gärna vidare!
 



  





 Apollo söker nu en skicklig BI-utvecklare till vårt datalagerteam, som främst fokuserar på datainmatningsfasen. Den idealiska kandidaten kommer att spela en avgörande roll när det gäller att skapa och underhålla vår datapipeline, vilket säkerställer ett sömlöst dataflöde från olika källor till vårt Azure Databricks-informationslager.
 



  





**Bakgrund** 




 För Apollo är utveckling lika viktigt som Grekland och världen. Att utveckla tjänster och produkter som ger våra slutkunder den bästa upplevelsen, innan, under och efter resan är ständigt i fokus för oss. Just nu arbetar vi med att byta ut vårt CMS och PIM till Contentful, samtidigt bygger vi en tydligare struktur där både utvecklare och produktägare ges än större befogenheter och ansvar för vår plattform.
 



 85% av Apollos försäljning sker online och vi lägger stor vikt vid att kontinuerligt förbättra kundupplevelsen genom att driva innovation som hjälper våra kunder att hitta, konfigurera och beställa sin drömresa. Våra utvecklingsteam tillsammans med våra produktägare och UX designers driver gemensamt utvecklingen av sitt område framåt, både på produktnivå såväl som tekniskt. Vi arbetar nära övriga avdelningar för att säkerställa att vi på bästa sätt nyttjar den långa och breda erfarenhet vi som organisation har om de resor vi erbjuder.
 



 Tjänsteplacering kommer att vara på huvudkontoret på Ynglingagatan i Stockholm, här sitter ca 170 av våra medarbetare varav 50 av dessa jobbar inom IT.
 



  





**Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden** 



* Designa, utveckla och underhålla datainmatningsprocesser från flera plattformar (AWS, Google osv.) och databaser (SQL Server, Oracle) till vår Azure Databricks-miljö.
* Skriva effektiva och skalbara Pythonscript och SQL-frågor för dataextraktion, transformation och inläsning (ETL).
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att förstå datakrav och implementera lämpliga intagslösningar.
* Felsöka och optimera processer för datainmatning för förbättrad prestanda och tillförlitlighet.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad med best practice och den senaste utvecklingen inom datainmatningsteknik.



  





**Nödvändiga färdigheter** 



* Minst 2-3 års erfarenhet av nedan, gärna mer
* Starka kunskaper i Python-programmering och SQL.
* Omfattande erfarenhet av datainmatning från olika källor, inklusive molnplattformar och relationsdatabaser.
* Gedigen förståelse för ETL-processer och datalagringskoncept.
* Kunskaper om Azure Databricks och andra molnbaserade dataplattformar.
* Utmärkt problemlösningsförmåga och analytisk förmåga.
* God Svenska och Engelska i tal och skrift



  





**Meriteriande färdigheter** 



* Erfarenhet av datamodellering och övergripande datalagerprocesser.



  





**Personlighet** 




 Då utvecklingsteamen arbetar verksamhetsnära är förmågan till goda relationer samt stort intresse för övriga delar av Apollo viktigt. Apollo andas och lever tillsammans, lagandan är tydlig och man utmanar gärna varandra positivt för att nå framgång. Branschen och Apollo är snabbrörliga, agila och så även du. Vidare är du en nyfiken social och kreativ lagspelare, kompetent, kommunikativ och stolt över ditt yrkeskunnande. Du delar med dig av din kunskap, är bra på att ge och ta konstruktiv feedback samt mån om att arbeta med kontinuerlig förbättring av såväl dig själv som verksamheten.
 



  





**Vårt erbjudande** 




 Apollo erbjuder en stimulerande och kreativ arbetsmiljö med varierande arbetsuppgifter som du har stor möjlighet att påverka. Vi har en platt organisation som uppmuntrar samarbete, kommunikation och delande av idéer inom och mellan olika avdelningar på Apollo. Vi erbjuder en arbetsplats där affären är viktigt samtidigt som vi har roligt och en bra balans mellan jobb och privatliv. Frågar vi våra utvecklare så beskrivs vi som en organisation där du uppmanas och har utrymme att lyfta idéer kring hemsidan eller teknikval. Vi ser också till att faktiskt testa nya tekniker vilket gör att vi ständigt utvecklas och utmanas, tillsammans i teamen! Utöver detta kommer du givetvis att erbjudas riktigt bra deals på resor utöver redan schyssta förmåner!
 



  





**Kontakt & Ansökan** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Aliby - The Pink Company. Då intervjuer och urval sker löpande ber vi dig att inte vänta med att skicka in ditt CV. Vid intresse vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult. Omar Burazerovic 0728–897441 / Lars Ohlson 0705-888175.
 



  





**Om Apollo** 




 Apollo är en branschledande researrangör som underlättat för skandinaver att komma ut i världen, först med resor till Grekland till att nu kunna erbjuda hela världen till våra kunder. Vi gör det genom vårt charterbolag Apollo, men även genom våra systerbolag Xtravel, Golf Plaisir, Out of Bounds och Lime Travel. Med mer än 35 år i branschen så fortsätter vi att växa och söker därför efter fler kompetenta IT-medarbetare som tillsammans med oss vill skapa resebranschens bästa kundresa, oavsett om den sker digitalt eller på en sandstrand i Grekland. Sedan 2015 är Apollo en del av den privatägda tyska koncernen REWE med över 300 000 medarbetare. REWE är stora inom dagligvaruhandel, sällanköp, reseindustrin, med mera. En stark ägare som även har fler andra resebolag i Europa inom koncernen som vi samarbetar med.

title: Oracle EPM developer till storbank
description:
Är du passionerad över teknik och vill göra en verklig skillnad i finansvärlden? Ta chansen att bli en del av ett högpresterande team på en av Sveriges ledande storbanker.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, möjlighet till distansarbete 1-2 dagar i veckan
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 I rollen som Oracle EPM utvecklare kommer du fokusera på att underhålla och utveckla finansiella lösningar för storbankens kunder. För att lyckas i rollen har du en god analytisk förmåga och goda tekniska kunskaper tillsammans med en god förståelse för affärs- och finansiella processer.
 


  


 Du kommer att ingå i ett agilt högpresterande team bestående av fyra personer med olika inriktningar inom teknik och ekonomi. Rollen är initialt ett konsultuppdrag via Academic Work, med möjlighet till överrekrytering.
 


  


  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**



  

  
* Skapa skräddarsydda Oracle-lösningar: Designa och implementera Oracle-verktyg som överensstämmer med bästa praxis och företagets affärsbehov.
  
* Optimera prestanda: Övervaka och finjustera systemen för att säkerställa högsta effektivitet.
  
* Lösa problem: Vara i framkant när det gäller att lösa problem och säkerställa smidig och effektiv drift.
  
* Samarbeta: Arbeta nära med ett mångsidigt team, dela insikter och driva kontinuerlig förbättring.
  


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Utbildningsmöjligheter: Tillgång till utbildningsprogram och kontinuerliga läranderesurser.
  
* Stöttande team: Under din introduktion kommer du arbeta dedikerat med en kollega som stöttar dig i din utveckling.
  
* Inkluderande kultur: En vänlig och välkomnande miljö där alla kan trivas.
  
* Innovationshub: Bli en del av ett innovativt företag i framkant av tekniken.
  
* Moderna arbetsmetoder: Omfamna agila och moderna arbetsmetoder.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Relevant examen: Exempelvis inom IT/datavetenskap eller ekonomisk bakgrund.
  
* Språk: Flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
  
* Tidigare erfarenhet: Dokumenterad teknisk kompetens från tidigare yrken eller projekt.
  
* EPM-expertis: Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att konfigurera och utveckla EPM-lösningar.
  
* Grundläggande förståelse: Programmering och affärssystem.
  
* Mycket goda kunskaper i engelska i tal och skrift
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har:**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av FCCS (Financial Consolidation Close)
  
* Erfarenhet av group accounting
  
* Goda kunskaper i Svenska i tal och skrift
  


  


  

**Personliga egenskaper för att lyckas i rollen:**



  

  
* Analytisk förmåga
  
* Proaktiv problemlösare
  
* Initiativtagande
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Filippa Danell Karlberg eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107325

title: Frontend utvecklare ( React, Typescript )
description:
Är du passionerad för webbdesign och användarupplevelse? Vill du vara med och utveckla nästa generations digitala lösningar? Hos oss får du möjligheten!
   

  

 Vad vi söker:
