title: System Engineer
description:
Systems Engineer
 



  





 Systems Engineer – Stockholm – Hybrid
 



  





 Are you passionate about networking and IT infrastructure? We’re partnering with one of Denmark’s largest and most established media organisations, working across the Nordics, looking for a Systems Engineer with a strong focus on Networks to join their growing Infrastructure and Operations team.
 



  





 As the organisation expands and faces exciting new challenges, the Infrastructure and Operations team is the backbone that ensures everything runs smoothly. This is an environment where you can take ownership of your work, collaborate with talented colleagues, and continuously learn. Whether you’re an experienced engineer or looking to develop your career, what matters most is your passion for networking and your drive to grow.
 



  





 Role and Responsibilities:
 



 • Design, implement, and manage the organisation’s network infrastructure and services.
 



 • Configure and maintain networks and servers to ensure seamless operations.
 



 • Collaborate closely with the operations team to design and build integrated systems.
 



 • Contribute to the design and implementation of IT security strategies.
 



 • Oversee networking and infrastructure across the entire organisation, navigating complex challenges with confidence.
 



  





 Requirements:
 



 • A genuine passion for IT, with a focus on infrastructure, operations, and networking.
 



 • Someone who’s not afraid to voice opinions and bring ideas to the table.
 



 • A proactive mindset, eager to take initiative and tackle challenges head-on.
 



 • Strong understanding of IT infrastructure and operations.
 



 • Fluency in both English and at least one Scandinavian language (the office operates locally).
 



 • Experience with Cloud networking, Cisco, Fortinet, and Windows Servers is a plus, but having the right attitude and mindset is the real key to success.
 



  





 Benefits:
 



 • Competitive compensation package.
 



 • Flexible working set-up
 



 • Regular social gatherings to foster team spirit and a positive work environment.
 



 • The opportunity to take ownership of your work and make a meaningful impact, without unnecessary bureaucratic hurdles.
 



 • Continuous learning and development opportunities, including mentorship from a networking expert within the team.
 



  





 If you are interested in learning more about this opportunity and think you have the right mindset to fit in with this team and demonstrate your passion for your work, then let us know! Apply with a CV via LinkedIn or reach out to Erin Chew, Recruitment Consultant, to learn more.

title: Technical Account Manager
description:
As the fintech industry continues to transform the financial landscape, Zimpler is leading the charge by delivering innovative solutions that empower businesses and individuals alike. We are seeking a passionate and skilled Technical Account Manager to join our Customer Operations team and help build our cutting-edge Customer Success function.
   

  

 Based in Stockholm, you will work closely with the Customer Support and Customer Integration teams, collaborating with the Customer Success Manager to deliver an exceptional customer experience. In this role, you will utilise your technical expertise, business insight, and outstanding relationship-building abilities to become a trusted technical advisor for our merchants.
   

  

**This Is What You’ll Do**
* Act as a proactive technical partner to our merchants, providing expert guidance and support.
* Analyze performance data and provide actionable recommendations to enhance customer outcomes.
* Serve as the escalation point for technical incidents, ensuring swift and effective resolution.
* Develop and implement performance reporting processes to track and optimize customer success.
* Design and refine onboarding processes for new clients, ensuring a smooth and seamless experience.
* Contribute to the creation of a platform that leverages customer data for continuous improvement.
* Coordinate and participate in regular meetings with customers to address current issues and explore future opportunities.


 ,
   

  

**This Is What You’re Good At**
* Experience with product management systems and client technical relationship management.
* Strong hands-on problem-solving skills with a proactive and solution-oriented approach.
* Excellent collaboration and communication abilities, with a proven track record of working effectively with cross-functional teams.
* High stress tolerance and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
* Experience in customer data optimization and a keen understanding of data-driven decision-making.
* Fluency in English and Swedish.
* A curious mindset with a passion for learning and growth.

title: Senior Cloud Security Architect
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en Cloud Security Architect och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.
   

  

**Vår ambitioner**
 Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vår kund söker en konsult för att hjälpa till att definiera nästa generations molnsäkerhetsarkitektur. Vi föreställer oss en hybridarkitekturlösning som kombinerar multicloud-funktioner med on-prem-lösningar. Som en del av arkitekturen ser vi behovet av att definiera adekvata och proportionella säkerhetsfunktioner, inklusive relevanta krav.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Företagssäkerhetsarkitektur för hybridmiljöer
* Säkerhetsarkitektur för Microsoft Azure, On-prem och Google Cloud Platform
* Säkerhetsfunktionalitet och verktyg som stödjer företags- och molnsäkerhetsarkitektur
* Beskriva en teknisk och organisatorisk transformationsväg från nuvarande tillstånd till nästa generations arkitektur
* Dokumentera arkitekturramverk och processer
* Facilitera och leda workshops med andra experter
* Kommunicera med fokus på att förklara komplexa idéer och ge råd och feedback
* Identifiera säkerhetsutmaningar och säkerhetsrisker inom molnsäkerhetsområdet


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 25-09-2024
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.
   

  

 Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: Senior Data Analyst – 10427
description:
We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our dynamic team.
 



  





**What You Will Work On:** 




  




* **Design and Develop Data Models:** 
  Build scalable, efficient data models aligned with business processes, ensuring data governance and trust across the organization.
* **Expert in Data Transformation:** 
  Automate data transformations using SQL and DBT, and leverage Python for custom solutions where needed.
* **Lead Analytical Projects:** 
  Drive data-driven initiatives that test hypotheses, solve complex problems, and provide actionable insights to stakeholders.
* **Innovate and Experiment:** 
  Stay at the forefront of industry trends in data processing and explore new methodologies to enhance data infrastructure.
* **Share Your Work:** 
  Present data models, analytical insights, and innovations to both internal teams and external stakeholders with clarity and confidence.



  





**What You Bring:** 




  




* **Professional Background:** 
  Proven experience in a Data Analyst, Data Engineer, or Data Scientist role, with a strong focus on data modeling and transformation.
* **Educational Qualification:** 
  Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, or Physics.
* **SQL Proficiency:** 
  Expertise in SQL with the ability to design, optimize, and analyze complex data queries.
* **Data Modeling Skills:** 
  Deep understanding of data modeling concepts to empower end-user self-service analytics.
* **Programming Skills:** 
  Proficiency in Python or Go for advanced data manipulation and automation.
* **Data Visualization:** 
  Strong ability to translate data into clear, actionable insights using visualization tools like Tableau.
* **Cloud Computing Awareness:** 
  Familiarity with modern cloud-based platforms and SaaS solutions, particularly FiveTran, Snowflake, DBT, and Tableau.

title: System Architect
description:
Are you an experienced software/system architect passionate about building state of the art systems? Do you possess a combination of hands-on technical expertise and holistic/strategic thinking?
   

  

 Then we have the right job for you!
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Podme was founded in 2017 with a vision to enrich everyday life by taking podcast entertainment to its full potential. Podme is your go-to place for quality podcasts, and brings you a fresh selection of curated content, including popular titles found nowhere else.
   

  

 Backed by Schibsted Media, the largest media group in Scandinavia, we are now on a growth journey which requires us to strengthen the data-driven excellence in our company.
   

  

**About This Position**
 As a System Architect at Podme, you will be a key player in shaping the future of our digital content delivery platform. This role involves designing, implementing, and evolving the end-to-end architecture to ensure a seamless, scalable, and innovative experience for our users. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into robust and sustainable technical solutions and practices.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Define and establish system specifications, guidelines, and architecture standards.
* Ensure technical decisions safeguard high-performance, scalability, and reliability of Podme platform and applications.
* Lead the technical research and evaluation of new products, services and partnerships.
* Lead the Architect Forum to align architectural decisions and design systems that can efficiently scale to meet growing user demands.
* Represent Podme within Schibsted Media’s architect community.
* Research and evaluate emerging technologies and evolve existing tech stack.


**Qualifications**
* Proven experience (2-5 years) as a System Architect or a similar role in relevant industry
* In-depth knowledge of streaming technologies, content delivery and content management.
* Experience with mobile app architectures
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


 If you're ready to help shape the future of podcast entertainment and join a passionate team, we'd love to hear from you!

title: Master Thesis Proposal - Predictive Cloud-based Scaling Algorithms
description:
In today's fast-paced business landscape, adaptability is the key to success. Are you tired of struggling to keep up with fluctuating workloads, leading to system crashes, downtime, and potentially frustrated customers?
 **It's time to pave the way for the future of efficiency and help us develop the scalable systems of tomorrow!**
 We would like to eliminate the headaches of managing server capacity and ensure optimal performance, even during peak demand. We want to develop a system that can automatically scale resources up or down based on real-time load and predict the stress of the system based on earlier data, ensuring applications run smoothly regardless of traffic spikes.
   

  

 The benefit of this approach is to eliminate system crashes, downtime and overspending on infrastructure. With a scalable system you only need to pay for the resources you use, reducing operational costs while enhancing performance.
   

  

 For this master thesis we would like to implement and evaluate different scaling algorithms that are relevant based on current studies and prior master theses. The goal of the algorithms is to predict the oncoming load of a system based on collected data and scale the system accordingly. Additionally, we foresee that different load patterns and algorithms can be tested and compared, based on, for example, machine learning, analysis in the frequency domain, etc. Finally, the implemented algorithms are evaluated and compared to industry-standard scaling algorithms in a cloud environment.
   

  

 Don't let fluctuations in workload hold your back. Embrace the power of automatic scalability and ensure seamless performance, no matter the demands.
 **Together, we'll drive efficiency and success to new heights, join us now!**
**Proposed research question:**
* What is the efficiency of predictive scaling algorithms in a cloud environment?


**Features:**
* Scalable applications: Kubernetes clusters, containers
* Cloud based applications.
* Predictivity models
* Simulations


**Background:**
* We foresee that a student with a background in software engineering will excel in the proposed assignment.
* We will only accept one student per assignment.


**Application:**
 We look forward to receiving your resume, and preferably, a personal letter in which you explain why you want to write your thesis with Syntronic.
   

  

 We screen and evaluate applications on an ongoing basis.

title: Konsultchef inom Mjukvaru- och Systemutveckling
description:

 Sigma Industry Development är ett dotterbolag inom SIEN-koncernen som fortsätter sin framgångsrika tillväxtresa utan att tumma på kvalitet. Två år i följd har pris vunnits som ett av Sveriges bäst välskötta företag, samt topp10-ranking i medarbetartrivsel på nationell nivå. Med andra ord är manegen krattad för fortsatta framgångar och arbetsglädje.
   

  

 Nu söker vi en konsultchef till sektionen Mekatronik. Sektionen utgörs idag av 13 ingenjörer inom AI, mjukvaru- och hårdvaruutveckling, test och verifiering. Du kommer ha fördelen att ansluta dig till en etablerad kundbas, men ha fria tyglar att sätta din prägel på verksamheten och dess framtida strategi, samtidigt som teamet vill utvecklas genom ditt ledarskap och målsättningar.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
 Din uppgift är att hjälpa teamet och verksamheten att utvecklas ytterligare, genom att navigera mot hög tillväxt och säkerställa nya affärer. Din roll är mångfacetterad där du kommer arbetar med att anställa de bästa talangerna och utveckla dessa, samtidigt som du brinner för affärsutveckling där målet är att etablera nya kundsamarbeten och driver in de stora affärerna. Detta utan att varken köra slut på ditt bränsle eller skada den goda (arbets-) miljön.
   

  

 Vi ser att du har erfarenhet från försäljning och ledarskap i konsultbranschen, samt ett brett nätverk i Stockholmsregionen och du är en person som inte bara snackar utan gillar att få saker att hända.
   

  

**Utbildning**

**Erfarenhet inom**
* Ledarskap

**Språkkunskap**
* Svenska och engelska, flytande i tal och skrift (båda är krav för anställning)

Vi som företag är måna om att hålla jämna takt med omvärlden och vi har som strategi att kontinuerligt fördjupa oss i de fördelar artificiell intelligens för med sig, i syfte att öka produktivitet - för oss och våra kunder.
   

  

 We offer

title: Analytics Engineer
description:
Avalanche Studios Group (ASG) is looking for an experienced Analytics Engineer to join our data team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating, designing and maintaining our data architecture. This role requires a deep understanding of data engineering, data modeling, data visualization, event design and best practices in those areas.
   

  

 This is a key role in developing our data lake by bridging the gap between our data engineer and our data scientists as well as ensuring that our data is timely, easy to work with and trusted across the company.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
**Clean and transform data for analytical use:**
* Develop and implement processes to extract, clean, and transform data from various sources to ensure it is ready for analysis.
* Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to understand their data needs and provide them with reliable datasets.
* Design and implement data models and aggregated history tables for all major KPI’s and user history.
* Design and implement data models that support business needs and analytics requirements.


**Maintain Data Documentation And Definitions**
* Create and maintain comprehensive data documentation, including data dictionaries, schemas, and metadata.
* Ensure that data definitions are consistent and easily accessible to all stakeholders.
* Ensure data quality, integrity, and availability:
* Implement automated data quality checks and validation processes to ensure the accuracy and reliability of data.
* Monitor data pipelines and systems to ensure high availability and performance alongside our data engineer.
* Help the game teams and analysts in designing the events that our games log as well as their associated triggers


**Share Best Practices Across The Organization**
* Promote a culture of data excellence by sharing best practices and providing training.
* Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in data engineering and analytics and share knowledge with the team.
* Write efficient, maintainable, and scalable analytics code using best practices.
* Conduct code and SQL reviews and provide feedback to ensure high standards of code quality within the team.


**Who You Are**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as an Analytics Engineer, Data Architect, or similar role.
* Strong proficiency in SQL and experience with data modeling tools and techniques.
* Experience with ETL processes and tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Talend, DBT etc.).
* Familiarity with cloud-based data platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure). GCP is a big plus.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
* Passion for gaming and a deep understanding of the gaming industry is a plus.


*Research shows that under-represented groups in the industry (especially women) might not apply for a job if they don't check off every requirement. Here at Avalanche Studios Group we're more about your drive to learn and interest in tackling challenges than what's on your resume. So, don't stress if you don't hit every mark— give it a shot and apply! Diversity of opinion and experience make our teams even better.*
**The Stockholm location**
 Our Stockholm office is situated in Södermalm, the beating heart of the city’s game industry. It’s a physical representation of our games – the lush vegetation of Just Cause and theHunter: Call of the Wild meets corroded metal straight out of Mad Max. It has everything you need to make it your creative base camp.
   

  

**About Us**
 Avalanche Studios Group is a game developer and publisher that defined and evolved open-world games, offering an amazing portfolio of fantastic games across multiple genres, including the Just Cause franchise, Rage 2, theHunter: Call of the Wild, Generation Zero, and Second Extinction as part of its portfolio.
   

  

**Employee promise**
 We provide goals, instead of instructions, and the opportunity to do the best work of your career.
   

  

**Our Values**
 At Avalanche Studios Group, we believe in worlds beyond limits, and we are committed to developing a diverse and inclusive workplace. We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. Everyone at Avalanche Studios Group has a shared responsibility to create an open and inclusive work environment where everyone is treated equally and with respect. Being part of our world is not contingent on where you’re from, your gender, or sexual orientation. It’s all about your passion and creativity.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 We will only consider applications that consist of both a cover letter and a CV. In your cover letter, you should include why you want to work at Avalanche Studios Group. For this role, you need to be able to work from within our Stockholm Studio, alongside the strategic partnerships team. We apply a hybrid work model that enables you to work some days from home and some days from the office.

title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!
   

  

 We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.
   

  

 With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.
   

  

 We are looking for you who want to grow with us!
   

  

 With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.
   

  

**Job description:**
 The primary tasks for a senior level Machine Learning Engineer in MLE area are:
   

  

* Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usageandscale out for a maintainable solution in the comprehensive fashion network of H&M.
* Design, develop and maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.
* Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns contributing to architectural decisions, technical roadmap planning, and to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.
* Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address both specific and common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, monitoring, A/B test, versioning, release, and serving of both online inference end-points and batch inference.
* Work in cross-functional agile team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders - to build the AI ecosystem within the company.


 Required skills and experiences:
   

  

* Have a BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Have 5+ years professional experience working in relevant role(s) for a senior level Machine Learning Engineer.
* A hands-on person, with great software engineering skills, who loves coding, and like applying good software engineering practices and DevOps principals to machine learning and AI projects.
* Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production and scaled in a bigger organization, also ensuring product quality, security and performance.
* Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 4+ years.
* Have great hands-on experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud Platform, and also including Vertex AI.
* Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, data pipelines and deploying ML applications to production.
* Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.
* Have experience handling and developing for high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream), preferably also including hands-on development in DBT, and have also a solid understanding of cloud data storage technologies and data quality.
* Have experience from aligning and analyzing requirement; driving design solutions; breaking down work into stories and tasks; supporting and mentoring team members; and making sure organizational standards and best-practices are implemented and followed.
* Familiar with agile ways of working, team collaboration and data-driven development.


**tart:** 
 Immediate
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months probationary employment.
   

  

 We interview candidates on an ongoing basis, do not wait to submit your application.

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**The role**
 A Senior Infrastructure Engineer improves our products and our services, ensure the team delivers with high quality, writes and review code, and take a leading role during troubleshooting. He or she make sure always to maintain a scalable infrastructure and bring automations to the next level. The Senior Infrastructure Engineer has knowledge and experience in different areas and technologies.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Lead full technical lifecycle of complex projects.
* Maintain and improve our products.
* Build for change and automation.
* Run workshops and training sessions.
* Act as an advisor and mentor for the team.
* Contribute to architectural and tech management discussions.
* Take responsibility and priorities backlogs.
* Guide and support the team and new starters in order to avoid current or recurring problems.
* Support Service Desk and 2:nd line with respect to task prioritisation and incident handling.
* Keep up to date with compliance training offered by the company.
* Support and act in line with the company values.
* Foster a culture of knowledge sharing.
* Collaborate to achieve common goals.
* Act as peer mentor and foster a culture of peer mentoring.
* Follow the company processes, procedures, and methodologies.


**Skille And Requirements**
* Good experience in Virtualization and Openstack.
* Excellent knowledge in Automation and Orchestration practices.
* Great knowledge in large scale production systems and technologies.
* Experience in designing and executing small to medium scale systems.
* Strong coding skills.
* Great knowledge in solving problems using open source software
* Good at building relationships.
* Good verbal and written communication skills.
* Economical awareness and knowing the importance of weight cost and value to take the most economic action.

title: Javautvecklare
description:
**Om Norla:** 




 Norla är ett IT- och Managementkonsultföretag som drivs av kundnöjdhet. Vi arbetar i en mångkulturell miljö och vi drivs av vår princip "Mind and Heart". Vi värdesätter att våra relationer med medarbetarna säkerställer deras professionella tillväxt och framgång. Vi arbetar tillsammans i ett nätverk av stora företag för att hitta de bästa talangerna för att stödja våra kunder.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som Javautvecklare hos vår kund kommer du att arbeta i en varierande och dynamisk miljö där du får möjligheten att utveckla, förbättra och underhålla system och applikationer.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har 5-6 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling
* Är väl insatt i objektorienterad programmering och systemarkitektur
* Har erfarenhet av ramverk som Spring, Hibernate eller liknande
* Har arbetat med databashantering, gärna med SQL
* Har förståelse för agila utvecklingsmetoder och verktyg som Git, Jenkins och Jira
* Erfarenhet av molnlösningar (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) är meriterande
* **Meriterande** 
  om du har arbetat inom offentlig sektor och har erfarenhet av upphandlingar, regler eller ramverk som är specifika för denna sektor



  





**Personliga egenskaper** 




 Vi söker en lösningsorienterad och noggrann person som har en stark kommunikativ förmåga och trivs med samarbete. Du bör vara självständig och ha en stark vilja att hålla dig uppdaterad kring nya teknologier och trender inom utveckling.

title: Fullstack Developer (Python &React/Angular/Vue)
description:
**About The Company**
 The company creates software for energy companies and startups, focusing on product development, data engineering, and cloud infrastructure. Their skilled team works with tools like Kubernetes, Airflow, and PostgreSQL, and incorporates machine learning using Spark and PyTorch. They also develop UIs with technologies like React and ThreeJS, ranging from admin panels to 3D digital twins.
   

  

**About The Candidate**
 The ideal candidate is passionate about coding and technology, proficient in at least one back-end language (python, python, python, python) and familiar with front-end languages. They are problem-solvers who make pragmatic decisions, work well in a team, and balance speed with scalable, maintainable solutions.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 The candidate will primarily focus on back-end projects, with some front-end involvement as needed. Responsibilities include mentoring, project planning, code reviews, and leading development teams.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* 5+ years of experience with a modern back-end stack, preferably Python
* Front-end development experience (React/Angular/Vue)
* Experience with AWS and/or Azure deployments
* Strong understanding of Docker, Git, and performance optimisation
* Leadership experience and strong communication skills
* Ability to build responsive applications handling large datasets
* Strong opinions on integrating external APIs

title: Associate - Market Entry Coordination
description:
*Do you want to be part of a leading European sustainability scaleup whilst contributing to the global transition? Position Green is in a strong scaleup phase and we are looking for new amazing talents to join our team.*
**About Us**
 At Position Green, we bring together leading experts within ESG advisory and software to help corporations accelerate their sustainability agenda. Our integrated offering spans across environmental, social and governance domains, and encompasses strategy advisory, data management, reporting, e-learning and executive training.
   

  

 Position Green has 700+ clients with more than 350 employees located
   

  

 across 10 locations in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, the US, Benelux and the UK. We are expanding our European team, and are looking for talented new team members to join us. You will become a pivotal member of our team, working alongside bright minded colleagues with different areas of expertise and backgrounds. We value our high-achieving yet informal working environment. Our team culture embraces giving and receiving feedback, testing, and welcoming new ideas.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
 As Position Green is growing at a fast pace, entering and succeeding in new markets is a critical enabler. For this, we need dedicated support and you will play a pivotal role in Position Green’s journey to enter new markets. Currently, our central European markets are a priority but you will from time to time also be involved in other endeavors. Reporting directly to our Chief Strategy Officer, your key responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Carrying out external market research and analysis to tailor our market entry tactics to local circumstances
* Carrying out internal research and analysis to verify the capability and product-market fit between Position Green and new markets
* Coordinating our internal market entry taskforces for individual markets, under the supervision of the Chief Strategy Officer and/or Managing Directors
* Providing support on establishing the infrastructure needed for successful market entry, for example on management information systems and/or sales processes and documentation
* Drafting, translating, and layouting a wide range of collateral marketing and sales material that is essential for a successful market entry
* Drafting and editing internal and external thought leadership material - for example on EU regulatory developments - that are essential for Position Green to succeed in entering new markets
* Providing practical and administrative support when and as needed, for example with regards to the establishment of new office locations (incorporation and registration processes).


**What You Should Bring**
 We are welcoming applications from talented candidates with different backgrounds and levels of experience, but preferably you have:
   

  

* University education, preferably with a marketing background
* 1-3 years of experience from SaaS, tech, start-up or scale-up, sustainability or advisory businesses (also alongside your studies, as relevant)
* Fluent in spoken and written English and German is a requirement – Dutch and any other European language is a bonus
* Previous experience of market entry strategies and tactics is meritorious


**What You Should Be Good At**
* You thrive and succeed in an extremely fast-paced environment, where expert knowledge is combined with a strong strategic and analytical skill set.
* You care about sustainability and the purpose of Position Green.
* You are good at strategic thinking but you do not shy away from practical tasks - you comfortably juggle between high and law, and are quick to get things done also at a practical level when it is “all hands on deck”.
* You are comfortable with ambiguity and have a problem-solving mindset.
* You work hard, and are agile and flexible, and are able to drive the execution of your tasks autonomously.
* You are a true team player and “people person” who is quick to establish good working relationships and build a network of supportive colleagues that will help you succeed in your role.


**Location**
 You are based in one of our main European office locations (Brussels, Copenhagen, London, Malmö, Oslo or Stockholm) and are comfortable working in a virtual team. You are also willing to travel for work, as required.
   

  

**What’s next?**
 If this sounds like a great opportunity for you, we will be happy to receive your CV. In this recruitment, great importance is placed on personal suitability.
   

  

 We will be reviewing applications on a continuous basis and looking forward to your application.
   

  

* Position Green Group is the Nordic leader in sustainability software and consulting.
* Supports 500+ customers worldwide.
* 300+ employees with expertise within strategy, communication, software development, environmental studies, engineering and social sciences.
* Awarded and recognized as one of the leading tech scaleups in the Nordics by Techarenan, Deloitte, Norrsken Impact Summit, Cleantech Scandinavia and Breakit.

title: R&D Product Manager
description:
Dassault Systèmes, "The 3DEXPERIENCE Company," provides businesses and individuals with the virtual worlds needed to design sustainable innovations that harmonize product, nature and life.
   

  

 As part of the
 *ENOVIA R&D* 
 teams, you will report to the
 *Product Portfolio Planning* 
 organization. This organization is in charge of developing solutions to design commercial offerings for highly configurable products.
   

  

 You will be responsible for the development of a new domain 'CPQ – Configure Price Quote' which will aim to enable our customers to design web and interactive 3D experiences for the creation of configurable and parametric product quotes. These solutions will also automate the creation of the product corresponding to these specifications, which is key for the ETO (Engineering to Order) and CTO (Configured to Order) processes.
   

  

 The solutions will need to integrate with existing 3DEXPERIENCE Platform solutions and the customer engagement, sales, and ordering ecosystem (changed word order)
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Define the product strategy within the 3DEXPERIENCE Platform as well as the value of the solution
* Formalize business use cases and their specificities
* Establish the overall architecture of the solution which will be Cloud/Web
* Write all the functional specifications to be covered
* Establish the development plan in line with the corporate guidelines in coordination with the R&D organizations of SOLIDWORKS, CATIA and 3DEXCITE
* Manage the activity of the teams (in France and India) in charge of developments
* Ensure the quality of applications delivered in accordance with company standards
* Mentor and manage multiple teams of developers


 Qualifications:
   

  

* With a higher education Bac+5, Engineering or University, you have significant professional experience acquired in the field of commercial configuration and quote management solutions.
* You have concrete experience in team management
* WEB Application Development (HTML/JavaScript/CSS)
* Development and deployment of SaaS applications and services
* You demonstrate good autonomy and rigor and you know how to synthesize
* You like to work in a multidisciplinary team and are a good listener and interpersonal
* Knowledge of existing market-leading solutions is a plus
* Knowledge of Dassault Systèmes' solutions of the NETVIBES, ENOVIA, CATIA, SOLIDWORKS brands would be a plus
* Your English is fluent in writing and speaking


 What’s in it for you:
   

  

* Multicultural environment
* Friendly working environment focused on well-being and health
* Commitment to diversity and inclusion
* Dynamic career development policy: training plan, internal mobility, etc.
* Integrating a scientific company at the heart of technological innovation, driven by strong growth for more than 40 years


**Diversity statement**
 As a game-changer in sustainable technology and innovation, Dassault Systèmes is striving to build more inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. We believe that our people are our number one asset and we want all employees to feel empowered to bring their whole selves to work every day. It is our goal that our people feel a sense of pride and a passion for belonging. As a company leading change, it’s our responsibility to foster opportunities for all people to participate in a harmonized Workforce of the Future.

title: Senior Client Director
description:
Kurppa Hosk is a brand agency with close to 80 employees across our offices in Stockholm and New York. We solve complex business problems by combining the sharpest strategic minds with the best designers in the industry, working across sectors to serve some of the world’s most renowned legacy brands alongside a selection of brave, progressive start-ups and scale-ups. We are also part of Eidra: a consultancy collective made up of the best companies within consulting, creativity, and engineering. We’re built to provide leaders with the concentrated expertise they need to drive commercial advantage at speed. With a foundation of management consultancy, we orchestrate the process from strategy to execution.
   

  

 As we continue to grow our offices in Stockholm and New York, we’re looking to bring on board a Client Director or Senior Account Director who can help us enable both new and current client relationships to flourish. A Senior Account Director / Client Director at Kurppa Hosk holds overall responsibility for a selection of clients and projects, actively leading and coordinating client assignments – typically for several clients and multiple workstreams simultaneously. They are responsible for owning the client relationship and for driving projects and processes forward – providing expert advice in all relevant areas along the way.
   

  

 Eloquently playing the dual advocacy role between client and Kurppa Hosk, this means working in partnership with both the client and agency team to understand business landscapes, project requirements, strategic objectives and ambition, before setting out a plan and scope to deliver success. You are detail-oriented but are also able to take a step back and see the bigger picture — identifying opportunities and challenges that lie ahead. You also have the requisite understanding to drive the commercial dimension of our partnerships together with the know-how to earn trust and advise clients through the process of creating meaningful and rewarding brand and business change. Intrinsic to this will be the ability to identify, initiate and orchestrate complex, transformative assignments across multiple Eidra companies leveraging the full value proposition of the group.
   

  

 As a person, you are driven
 **,** 
 and welcome equal parts responsibility and accountability. Diverse in your skillset, you have experience of managing both strategic and creative development processes and projects. You are innovative and like to push the boundaries and as such, are able to adapt your experiences and take on new challenges if required — even if this means stepping out of your comfort zone from time to time, you maintain an attitude of ‘anything is possible’. You have a proven track record of or evident talent for and interest in developing long term brand partnerships alongside managing complex project lifecycles from beginning to end, getting the best out of cross-disciplinary teams to create brand experiences that can travel across platforms and create lasting impact for businesses.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* The opportunity to drive transformation for some of the world’s leading brands, in a highly international context
* A highly stimulating and collaborative work environment comprised of highly talented consultants, creatives and engineers across the Eidra group
* Newly refurbished, state-of-the-art offices at Grev Tureplan, Stockholm
* A thriving agency culture and extracurricular scene
* Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits


**Main Responsibilities**
* Overall responsibility for a selection of KH’s clients and assignments
* Actively lead and coordinate client assignments, advising and supporting the client in all relevant areas throughout the process.
* Autonomous management of transformational workstreams involving cross-disciplinary Eidra teams
* Develop existing client relationships and proactively initiate new projects.
* Manage interdisciplinary teams to execute strategic and conceptual work plus the subsequent implementation of defined deliverables; establishing the most viable approach and ensuring that every team member understands their role, tasks and deadlines
* Prepare, lead and follow up on client meetings, keeping stakeholders informed, internally as well as externally.
* Project planning and definition of project scope and approach, including objectives, deliverables, schedule and budget.
* Plan and organize pitch processes and participate in other new business activities.


**The Ideal Person**
* Has a genuine understanding and interest in solving business problems with creativity as well as a passion for the art and craft of branding.
* Has a proven track record of having successfully managed or an evident talent for managing complex accounts and large-scale brand, communication and digital development projects.
* Is eager to grow further and become a trusted brand advisor to our clients.
* Has the grit and stamina to keep pushing for quality in long-term brand partnerships
* Has excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English, both verbally and written (the KH office is English-first)
* Has exceptional relationship-building, negotiation and presentation skills
* Is a flexible and pragmatic person who remains calm in a fast-paced environment
* Has a positive, collaborative and creative, problem-solving attitude
* Documented international experience is highly desirable.
* Minimum education level BA or equivalent education in relevant field


 Kurppa Hosk is a brand agency with 80+ employees and offices in Stockholm, New York, Chicago, Oslo & Amsterdam.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: Junior Opportunity Manager, deltid
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
*Är du i början av din karriär och vill utvecklas inom service och kundrelationer? Då har vi den perfekta möjligheten för dig! Vi söker just nu drivna lagspelare som älskar att sätta kunden i centrum till vårt team i Alvik, Stockholm. Kom och bli vår nya kollega på HQ i Alvik, Stockholm!*
 Vi är ett innovativt och kundorienterat företag med en stark passion för att erbjuda förstklassig service och bygga långsiktiga relationer med våra kunder. Vår verksamhet expanderar snabbt och vi söker nu tre dedikerade medarbetare som vill bli en del av vår spännande resa som Europas ledande digitala plattform för begagnade bilar.
   

  

**Hur din nya roll kommer att vara**
 I rollen som Junior Opportunity Manager kommer du att utgöra en viktig funktion av vårt Customer Service Team, där du bland annat kommer att...
   

  

* Vara första kontaktpunkten för våra kunder som visat intresse på vår inköps-plattform
* Via telefon erbjuda en enastående service och professionell upplevelse.
* Vägleda kunderna genom vår inköpsprocess, samt hjälpa dem att boka in sig för ett möte på någon av våra 18 inköpsstationer runt om i Sverige.
* Samarbeta internt med dina kollegor ute på våra inköpsstationer, med uppföljning av bokningar och säkerställande av en hög kundnöjdhet.


 Tjänsten är på deltid vid behov samt varannan lördag. Timlön+ ob. Tillsättning sker enligt överenskommelse. Den här tjänsten är placerad på vårt huvudkontor i Alviks Strand.
   

  

**Vad vi vill att du har med dig**
* En utpräglad känsla för service och noggrannhet
* Utmärkt kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska både muntligt och skriftligt.
* Kundorienterad och ha ett säljande sätt med ett stort mått av engagemang och entusiasm samt trivas med eget ansvar
* Erfarenhet av kundservice, försäljning eller motsvarande roll är meriterande men inget krav.


**Varför AUTO1 Group**
* En internationell arbetsplats med spännande nationella och internationella projekt
* En internationell arbetsplats med stor möjlighet att påverka och sätta din egen prägel på arbetet
* Bra förmåner, allt i från friskvårdsbidrag till förskottssemester
* En miljö som är öppen, positiv och motiverande med platta hierarkier och korta beslutsvägar
* En självständig och ansvarsfull roll i ett snabbväxande techbolag där du har stor inverkan på vår fortsatta framgång


**Vilka vi är**
 AUTO1 Group är Europas ledande digitala plattform för bilbranschen. Vi bygger det bästa sättet att köpa och sälja bilar online. Vårt lokala varumärke, viköperdinbil.se, erbjuder våra kunder det snabbaste och smidigaste sättet att sälja bil på. Vårt varumärke, AUTO1.com, är Europas största B2B-plattform för bilåterförsäljare. Genom vårt varumärke Autohero, använder vi våra erfarenheter till att bygga ett varumärke som erbjuder det den bästa kundupplevelsen när det gäller att köpa bil online. Med över 4000 anställda i Europa, AUTO1 Group finns just nu på över 30 marknader och hade en omsättning på över 6.5 miljarder euro in 2022.
   

  

 AUTO1 Group har en intern värdegrund som bygger på alla människors lika värde. Alla ansökningar kommer därför att hanteras på ett likvärdigt sätt oavsett kön, könsöverskridande identitet eller uttryck, sexuell läggning, etnisk tillhörighet, religion eller annan trosuppfattning, funktionsvariant och ålder.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Är du redo för din nästa utmaning? Du är varmt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan (CV samt personligt brev) via ansökningsknappen nedan. Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl eller telefon med hänsyn till dataskyddsförordningen (GDPR). Vid frågor vänligen kontakta oss på rekrytering@auto1.com. Vi sköter urval och intervjuer löpande från och med augusti tills vi har hittat rätt person.
   

  

**Are we a match?**
 If you see challenges as opportunities, this is the place for you. We challenge the highly fragmented market of used cars in Europe and push ourselves to master the daily challenge of offering our customers the best way to sell and buy cars online. Tackling real challenges is our sustainable way to personal development.
   

  

 Moreover, we are a fast-paced environment. We ensure fast processes towards our customers, while internally the dynamic spirit from early start-up days lives on. We never settle, we challenge and question everything, constantly looking for improvement and new opportunities. As an international team, flat hierarchies and fast decisions are our key ingredients.
   

  

 Last but not least, something that our employees at AUTO1 know very well is that growth brings constant change - which means that new challenges arise. From starting in 2012 to today, AUTO1 Group is a rare success story of tremendous growth and we don’t plan on stopping anytime soon. You will experience a steep learning curve by working on projects at scale and thus having real impact, all while benefiting from the stability of our proven business model.

title: Channel Account Manager, GFI Software (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, GFI Software. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Are you ready to step into the future of sales and channel management? The channel management industry often grapples with inefficiencies in scaling operations, maintaining consistent growth, and effectively integrating technology to enhance partner interactions. Many companies still rely on traditional methods that lack data-driven decision-making and advanced analytical capabilities.
   

  

 At GFI, we revolutionize this space by integrating generative AI across all facets of our channel management processes. Our cutting-edge approach not only optimizes operations but also drives sustained revenue growth by enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of our network of distributors, resellers, and MSPs. This is an electrifying opportunity to be at the forefront of tech-driven sales innovation, leveraging AI to transform standard practices into dynamic, strategic engagements that deliver measurable results.
   

  

 This role is not your typical channel sales role. You will be expected to master and deploy Generative AI tools, ensuring our partnerships are not just maintained but also optimized and expanded through strategic data-driven methodologies. Your work will involve rigorous partner recruitment, dynamic training sessions, and stringent performance assessments—all enhanced by advanced AI.
   

  

 You'll fit into a team of forward-thinkers where each member is crucial in sculpting the future landscape of channel sales. Your role is pivotal in shaping how partnerships flourish in a tech-driven environment, ensuring both the growth of GFI and our partners. If you are eager to redefine industry standards and possess a robust blend of generative AI proficiency, professional communication, and channel sales management, we encourage you to apply. Join us in transforming the blueprint of channel management and take your place as a leader in a cutting-edge sales revolution.
   

  

 NOTE: If you receive an interview invitation, it is expected that you conduct in-depth research into GFI's products and business model beforehand.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Partner Recruitment and Onboarding: Identifying, recruiting, and onboarding new partners to expand the channel network. This involves evaluating potential partners' alignment with the company's values and goals, as well as their market reach and capabilities.
* Training and Development: Providing partners with the necessary training and resources to effectively sell and support the product. This includes product training, sales techniques, and ongoing professional development to enhance their capabilities.
* Performance Monitoring and Management: Continuously monitoring the performance of partners against predefined benchmarks and metrics. This includes regular assessment of sales figures, customer feedback, and other performance indicators to identify areas for improvement.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Directly selling to end-user customers
* Prioritizing the quantity of interactions over the quality of your engagements with partners
* Worrying about unpredictable earnings and relentless travel demands


**Channel Account Manager Key Responsibilities**
* Sustained revenue growth from efficiently managing and optimizing a network of distributors, resellers, and MSPs using GenerativeAI tools


**Basic Requirements**
* Advanced generative AI proficiency (i.e., use of multiple AI tools, ability to automate workflows and custom GPTs); if you've only used LLMs for research, learning, brainstorming, or content generation, that will be deemed insufficient
* 1+ year of indirect channel sales experience in the software industry (direct sales experience does not count)


**About GFI Software**
 GFI Software develops essential applications for small and medium businesses. Over 80,000 customers choose GFI solutions for network management and performance, security, and collaboration applications. GFI Software available through thousands of channel partners dedicated to serving specific countries and regions worldwide.
   

  

 GFI has a fully remote, global workforce. GFI has partnered with Crossover to administer its hiring and global workforce management.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
